**Is this a bug report or feature request?**
* Bug Report

**Deviation from expected behavior:**
Deleting the CephObjectStoreUser does not delete the generated secret.

**Expected behavior:**
The generated secret should be deleted. 

**How to reproduce it (minimal and precise):**
<!-- Please let us know any circumstances for reproduction of your bug. -->
$ kubectl create -f operator.yaml
$ kubectl create -f cluster.yaml
$ kubectl create -f toolbox.yaml
$ kubectl create object.yaml 
$ kubectl create -f object.yaml 
$ kubectl create -f object-user.yaml 
radosgw-admin can be used to list and display information about the created user .
kubectl get secrets can be used to display the stored secret

$ kubectl delete -f object-user.yaml
radosgw-admin fails to find the user
kubectl get secrets is still able to display the stored secret

Error message displayed in logs of rook-discover
2019-02-14 20:25:59.136751 W | op-object: failed to delete user my-user secret. secrets "rook-ceph-object-user-my-user" not found

Error lines are [here](https://github.com/rook/rook/blob/master/pkg/operator/ceph/object/user/controller.go#L194-L197)


**Environment**:
* OS (e.g. from /etc/os-release):
Fedora 29
* Kernel (e.g. `uname -a`):
Linux kube-master 4.20.4-200.fc29.x86_64 #1 SMP Wed Jan 23 16:11:28 UTC 2019 x86_64 x86_64 x86_64 GNU/Linux
* Cloud provider or hardware configuration:
Lenovo black box
* Rook version (use `rook version` inside of a Rook Pod):
kubectl  -n rook-ceph-system exec rook-ceph-agent-n7slj -- rook version
 rook: v0.9.0-144.gdf73f14
* Kubernetes version (use `kubectl version`):
kubectl version
Client Version: version.Info{Major:"1", Minor:"13", GitVersion:"v1.13.3", GitCommit:"721bfa751924da8d1680787490c54b9179b1fed0", GitTreeState:"clean", BuildDate:"2019-02-01T20:08:12Z", GoVersion:"go1.11.5", Compiler:"gc", Platform:"linux/amd64"}
Server Version: version.Info{Major:"1", Minor:"13", GitVersion:"v1.13.3", GitCommit:"721bfa751924da8d1680787490c54b9179b1fed0", GitTreeState:"clean", BuildDate:"2019-02-01T20:00:57Z", GoVersion:"go1.11.5", Compiler:"gc", Platform:"linux/amd64"}

* Kubernetes cluster type (e.g. Tectonic, GKE, OpenShift):
libvirt
* Storage backend status (e.g. for Ceph use `ceph health` in the [Rook Ceph toolbox](https://rook.io/docs/Rook/master/toolbox.html)):
kubectl -n rook-ceph exec  rook-ceph-tools-76c7d559b6-tnmrf -- ceph status
  cluster:
    id:     eff29897-252c-4e65-93e7-6f4975c0d83a

  services:
    mon: 3 daemons, quorum a,c,b
    mgr: a(active)

    rgw: 1 daemon active

    pgs:     600 active+clean
title: Deleting CephObjectStoreUser does not delete secret
